name: Context.Metadata.PresentablePaths
desc: The identifier path of a context to use as one of the presentable paths in a contextâ€™s metadata.

items.name: path
items.desc: An array of strings that locates a context within a context hierarchy. Each string in the array represents a context, starting from the main app context, through any ancestor contexts, down to the child context. Use the identified context as a presentable path.
